top_comments.comment:
"super secret Easter Eggs"

"..you can find these obvious, blatant The Shining references peppered throughout Layers of Fear 2 by playing normally"
Chipsturs! Long time no chat! Your old buddy Aaron from RetroLiberty sending you love! <3

comments_since_last_sample.body:
There's a series of games I bought and I was wondering if anyone covered the Easter Eggs in them.
Odallus, Oniken, and Blazing Chrome.
These are amazing indie games not many people know about. Their world are connected in subtle ways but they have enemies and Easter Eggs referencing several movies and games. From horror to sci-fi. It would be neat if you'd check them out.
5:40 the fly I caught in a jar be like
